Reviews.Title: Camera Lens fell off
Reviews.Author: ldev956000
Reviews.Content: I bought this and at first it worked as expected, however with the inevitable fishing around that is associated with using the camera the glass lens fell off and the LEDs stopped working.The box that the camera came in was higher quality.

Reviews.Title: No Mac software available
Reviews.Author: P. McKee
Reviews.Content: The product is advertised to work with a Mac. The package comes with a 3-inch CD that doesn't read on my computer. I tried to locate the manufacturer's website to download the software. There is an error message says the website doesn't exist.I tried looking for the software on third-party sites, and only PC drivers are available. The camera seems well made, but it's totally useless to me if I can't get it to operate on my computer. As far as I'm concerned, this product and its company are a dud.
